body:
Magarena 1.26 (Debian Linux Wheezy)

1. Summon Deadwood Treefolk
2. Pass some turns and sacrifice it via 'vanishing' ability
3. Select a creature to return from graveyard. In particular, select the Deadwood Treefolk.

Card text:
"When Deadwood Treefolk enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, return *another* target creature from your graveyard to your hand."

Emphasis mine.
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: Deadwood Treefolk can return itself from graveyard, but shouldn't.

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 18eabdcf11e7 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Thanks for the report. Fixed for next release.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on June 23, 2012 02:15:59_

Magarena 1.26 (Debian Linux Wheezy)

1. Summon Deadwood Treefolk
2. Pass some turns and sacrifice it via 'vanishing' ability
3. Select a creature to return from graveyard. In particular, select the Deadwood Treefolk.

Card text:
"When Deadwood Treefolk enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, return *another* target creature from your graveyard to your hand."

Emphasis mine.
